thread.title: exceeding the expectation
thread.title_full: exceeding the expectation - Review of Citadines Bastille Marais Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Michel H
title: exceeding the expectation
text:
lovely and friendly place very convenient room is big comparing to hotel rooms in paris which is small.friendly staff .attentive.helpfull.very nice studio with small kitchen provided with all appliances ,its more than expected thank you
Room Tip: house keeping is not provided always as its residential place so just be aware however its wonderful... See more room tips
